title: S4 Ep33: The PPE panic of 2020
itunes:title: The PPE panic of 2020
description: In the scramble for PPE in early 2020, prices spiked, supplies dried up, and doctors were forced to use garbage bags for protection. A year on, Chad Bown has examined what happened, and he tells Tim Phillips how we can avoid a repeat.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
